name: @panva/oauth4webapi
description: OAuth 2 / OpenID Connect for Web Platform API JavaScript runtimes
author: Filip Skokan <panva.ip@gmail.com>

scripts._format: find src test examples conformance -type f -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.mjs' | xargs prettier
scripts.build: rm -rf build && tsc && tsc --declaration true --emitDeclarationOnly true --removeComments false && tsc -p examples && tsc -p conformance
scripts.conformance: rm -rf build && tsc -p conformance --noEmit false && ava --config build/conformance/ava.config.js
scripts.prepack: npm run format && npm run docs && ./examples/.update-diffs.mjs && git diff --quiet && npm run test && npm run build
